Complete Workflow for all R.scripts
```{r}
# Step 1: Run master analysis
source("hybrid_distance_master.R")

# Step 2: Create taxonomy
source("create_taxonomy_from_results.R")

# Step 3: Visualize taxonomy
source("visualize_taxonomy.R")

# Step 4: Create all figures
taxonomy_figures <- create_all_taxonomy_figures(
  results = real_data_results,
  taxonomic_matrix = taxonomic_matrix
)

# Step 5: View individual figures
print(taxonomy_figures$dendrogram)
print(taxonomy_figures$heatmap)
print(taxonomy_figures$morphospace)
```
